column5: The Mobile Skin is online. I will be adding touch technology to it as soon as I can...within a few days hopefully. I want to run that software in a test enviornment first before I add it to the site. The new skin supports Android, iPhone, Blackberry, Mini Opera and Opera Mobile, Palm Pre, iPod Touch, iPhone Simulator, Mobile Safari and SymbianOS. Any bugs, report in the support sticky up top.
Is it the lo-fi choice from the drop down menu?
Please excuse my tech ignorance but is a mobile skin??
I guess it helps if I turn it on.  Look for OFC Mobile  A mobile skin is for use with cell phones, blackberry, etc.
Ok...got it loaded now.  The profile pictures on my blackberry seem to large...can you auto downsize them to a standard size for this skin?
Looks good on my iphone Rick
And here is a test reply from iPhone
Perfect works great on my Android Magic. Thanks
